name: Roo.EventObject

methods.name: getPageX
methods.desc: Gets the x coordinate of the event.

methods.name: getPageY
methods.desc: Gets the y coordinate of the event.

methods.name: getTime
methods.desc: Gets the time of the event.

methods.name: getXY
methods.desc: Gets the page coordinates of the event.

methods.name: getWheelDelta
methods.desc: Normalizes mouse wheel delta across browsers

methods.name: within
methods.desc: Returns true if the target of this event equals el or is a child of el

params.name: related
params.desc: (optional) true to test if the related target is within el instead of the target

methods.name: hasModifier
methods.desc: Returns true if the control, meta, shift or alt key was pressed during this event.

methods.name: getTarget
methods.desc: Gets the target for the event.

params.name: selector
params.desc: (optional) A simple selector to filter the target or look for an ancestor of the target

params.name: maxDepth
params.desc:
(optional) The max depth to
                search as a number or element (defaults to 10 || document.body)

params.name: returnEl
params.desc: (optional) True to return a Roo.Element object instead of DOM node

methods.name: preventDefault
methods.desc: Prevents the browsers default handling of the event.

methods.name: getCharCode
methods.desc: Gets the key code for the event.

methods.name: getKey
methods.desc: Returns a normalized keyCode for the event.
